title: Spirit Guard Udyr
body: My friend gifted me a mystery skin and i got spirit guard udyr but i dont have the icons or banner

replies.body:
This isn't the first time this has happened, and we're collecting data to see why it happens to some people and not others.

Anyway, I've added the icons to your account.  The borders are attached to the icons, so if you want to use a specific border you just have to equip that icon. :)
Hi, I just got spirit guard udyr as well through mystery gift (From you guys! :D Thank!) but did not receive  the icon or banners :/ help?
Congrants on getting SGU through mystery gift.

Hi guys,

If you get this issue (got the skin but not the icons etc.), please submit a ticket to Riot at http://support.leagueoflegends.com and they'll be able to grant them manually :-)
Congrats on getting that skin.  It looks really good.  I got it when it came out (I **needed** that Phoenix Icon) and it's super cool.  I just wish I was better at Udyr.

> [{quoted}](name=Jberry2000,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=13g3XzE1,comment-id=,timestamp=2014-12-27T18:03:28.379+0000)
>
> My friend gifted me a mystery skin and i got spirit guard udyr but i dont have the icons or banner

Dammit man, I'm jealous. You got the Godyr, I got Justicar Aatrox (not bad though :O)
